title: Hand With Index Finger And Thumb Crossed Medium Light Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Fingers Crossed Medium Light Skin Tone
description: Represents good luck, hope, or a wish. Also used to indicate a promise or a commitment.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the hand with index finger and thumb crossed emoji displays a medium-light skin tone with a smooth, healthy sheen, thanks to Apple's realistic lighting and shading.  The fingers are gently curved with softly rounded edges, conveying a friendly and approachable gesture.  This emoji, as seen on Apple devices, is commonly used to wish someone good luck or to express hope and anticipation.
